{"id":1479002468,"question_id":3632,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11Â months","timestamp":1734230090,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1479002468/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Button with Longest Push Time","memory":"26.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int buttonWithLongestTime(vector<vector<int>>& events) {\n        int N = (int)events.size();\n\n        int time = events[0][1];\n        for (int i=1; i<N; i++) {\n            time = max(time, events[i][1] - events[i-1][1]);\n        }\n\n        int ind = INT_MAX;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            if (i && events[i][1] - events[i-1][1] == time) {\n                ind = min(ind, events[i][0]);\n            } else if (!i && events[i][1] == time) {\n                ind = min(ind, events[i][0]);\n            }\n        }\n\n        return ind;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"button-with-longest-push-time","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":963}
